Name: Desolatium: Prologue
About the game: We have always believed that God sent his son into the world to save us. But, what if that is not what happened? What if the world cannot be saved? The real story is about to be revealed . DESOLATIUM: PROLOGUE is a first-person point & click Graphic Adventure based on Lovecraft Mythos. Live this horror story where you will have to visit mysterious locations, face lovecraftian creatures, find clues and combine objects to solve puzzles. Get ready and dive into the beginning of the story, because the full game is coming soon: / EXPLORE MYSTERIOUS LOCATIONS Explore a city outside the limits of time and space; meet mysterious characters who will guide you on your journey. FACE LOVECRAFTIAN CREATURES Face lovecraftian creatures that came from the most remote places in the universe to test your sanity. FIND CLUES Find clues to move forward and uncover an intriguin backstory. COMBINE OBJECTS TO SOLVE PUZZLES Interact with the objects around you to solve complex puzzles in order to get to the terrible presence of a cosmic entity of immense power: Cthulhu. /
